casebody.data:
Columbus Bar Association v. Battisti.

[Cite as Columbus Bar Assn. v. Battisti (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 452.]

(No. 00-764 Submitted July 6, 2000 Decided December 27, 2000.) *453Randall Arndt, Patricia K. Block and Bruce A. Cam/pbell, for relator. Ronald L. Solove, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings of the board and its conclusion that respondent violated DR 1-102(A)(5) and 7-102(A)(5). We do not conclude that respondent violated DR 1-102(A)(4). Our review of the stipulated facts also indicates that respondent’s infraction was an isolated incident. We adopt the recommendation of the board and respondent is hereby publicly reprimanded.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
